body_axes.description: Right-handed body frames. +X points forward along the docking axis, +Y points toward the starboard/right side, and +Z points toward the crew hatch/docking tunnel. Distances are measured in meters from each vehicle's center of mass.
body_axes.notes: Orientation vectors below are initial approximations for Milestone M2 scaffolding and will be refined during the guidance/RCS tuning pass.

sources: Apollo 11 Command and Service Module News Reference (1969) – Reaction Control System overview.
Apollo 11 Lunar Module News Reference (1969) – Reaction Control System overview.
metadata.notes: Thruster geometry captures cluster placement, expected control axes, and baseline performance figures so the upcoming guidance milestone can derive pulse-train budgets without reopening the primary sources.

clusters.label: Service Module RCS Quad A
clusters.description: Upper starboard quad; positive roll is produced when paired with Quad C.

thrusters.label: Quad A +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-up jet fired during +Y body rotation corrections.

thrusters.label: Quad A -Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Produces left yaw when paired with opposite roll jets.

thrusters.label: Quad A -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-down jet; nominally fires with Quad C Aft jets for translation trims.

thrusters.label: Quad A +Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-right jet. Roll authority achieved when cross-fired with Quad C counterparts.

clusters.label: Service Module RCS Quad B
clusters.description: Upper port quad mirrored across the +Z axis.

thrusters.label: Quad B -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pairs with Quad D for forward pitch-down authority.

thrusters.label: Quad B +Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-right jet mirrored from Quad A to balance moment arms.

thrusters.label: Quad B +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-up jet providing redundancy for Quad A.

thrusters.label: Quad B -Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-left jet sharing feed lines with B2.

clusters.label: Service Module RCS Quad C
clusters.description: Lower port quad providing counter-torque for roll manoeuvres.

thrusters.label: Quad C +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Complements Quad A to maintain symmetrical pitch moments.

thrusters.label: Quad C -Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-left jet mounted on the lower port side.

thrusters.label: Quad C -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-down jet feeding the same manifold as C1.

thrusters.label: Quad C +Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-right jet enabling coupled roll rates with Quad A.

clusters.label: Service Module RCS Quad D
clusters.description: Lower starboard quad; mirrors Quad C across the +X axis.

thrusters.label: Quad D -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-down jet used with Quad B for coordinated manoeuvres.

thrusters.label: Quad D +Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-right jet located on lower starboard quadrant.

thrusters.label: Quad D +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-up jet supporting aft translation pulses.

thrusters.label: Quad D -Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-left jet completing the quad symmetry.

clusters.label: LM RCS Quad A
clusters.description: Located near the +Y/+Z strut providing nose-right and nose-up control.

thrusters.label: Quad A +Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Primary nose-right thruster for rendezvous translation.

thrusters.label: Quad A +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Provides nose-up authority during ascent staging.

thrusters.label: Quad A -Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Counter-yaw jet for docking alignment corrections.

thrusters.label: Quad A -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Nose-down jet aiding translation toward the CSM.

clusters.label: LM RCS Quad B
clusters.description: Upper port quad offering lateral translation authority.

thrusters.label: Quad B +Roll jet
thrusters.notes: Supplies positive roll when combined with Quad D opposite jet.

thrusters.label: Quad B +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-up jet aiding attitude hold during docking.

thrusters.label: Quad B -Roll jet
thrusters.notes: Negative roll thruster matched with Quad D.

thrusters.label: Quad B -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Nose-down jet balancing the quad.

clusters.label: LM RCS Quad C
clusters.description: Lower port quad tied to the descent stage strut.

thrusters.label: Quad C -Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Provides nose-left control during rendezvous braking.

thrusters.label: Quad C +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-up jet balancing upper clusters.

thrusters.label: Quad C +Yaw jet
thrusters.notes: Yaw-right thruster near the descent engine skirt.

thrusters.label: Quad C -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Nose-down jet aiding translation toward the CSM.

clusters.label: LM RCS Quad D
clusters.description: Lower starboard quad; completes the redundant roll/yaw authority pairs.

thrusters.label: Quad D +Roll jet
thrusters.notes: Positive roll jet complementing Quad B1.

thrusters.label: Quad D -Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Nose-down jet for descent stage thruster symmetry.

thrusters.label: Quad D -Roll jet
thrusters.notes: Negative roll jet ensuring full rotational coverage.

thrusters.label: Quad D +Pitch jet
thrusters.notes: Pitch-up jet balancing the lower starboard quadrant.
